data.client_settings: x64, current Stable version as of 1-19-2018
data.actual_result: You only get posts for the first day of that month.
data.expected_result: The user should get a list of posts taking place during that entire month.
data.short_description: Discord's during:CORRECTION: "During:YYYY-MM" search parameter fails to display results beyond the first day of the month searched.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the search bar - Search using the "during:" parameter - Enter a date in this fashion: YYYY-MM
